page.title: 11Wormleighton Hound Puppies
page.content: This area is good hunting country and is used by the Bicester and Warden Hunt. Some farmers keep special areas of the farm to enable the hunt to ride over easily thus causing no inconvenience to either hunt or farmer. Puppy walking is done on one of the farms. The hound puppies are delivered by the Master of the Hounds at eight weeks of age and are usually walked around the farm for four months. The puppies are not walked on leads but are free and as a matter of course follow the person who accompanies them or runs alongside horses.
